name: Ambush Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
abilities.description: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

abilities.name: Surprise Attack.
abilities.description: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.
